description: Try our easy to follow Easy Tiramisu recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Tiramisu Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Dip half the biscuits, one at a time, into coffee mixture for a few seconds, then place in a single layer at the bottom of a 20cm square serving dish. Spread with half the cream mixture. Repeat with remaining biscuits, and coffee and cream mixtures. Dust with cocoa and chill for 2 hours or overnight. Serve.

Repeat with remaining biscuits, and coffee and cream mixtures. Dust with cocoa and chill for 2 hours or overnight. Serve.
